metadata.title: CVE-2017-17524 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: library/www_browser.pl in SWI-Prolog 7.2.3 does not validate strings beforelaunching the program specified by the BROWSER environment variable, whichmight allow remote attackers to conduct argument-injection attacks via acrafted URL.

criterions.comment: swi-prolog package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
